subTitle: Explore my portfolio showcasing diverse web projects highlighting creativity, functionality, and technical expertise.

featured.title: ShadowSuit (Cybersecurity Project)
featured.name: ShadowSuite
description: ShadowSuite is a premier cybersecurity software platform developed for an Indian client. The site provides a secure, professional, and user-friendly interface to explore, evaluate, and purchase specialized cybersecurity software.

It is built using Next.js, supports dynamic product interactions, and includes WhatsApp-based client support. The website serves as a commercial hub for elite cybersecurity tools intended for authorized and educational use.

projects.name: Figma Design to Coding Web Design

fullStackProject.title: Full-stack Ecommerce Project
fullStackProject.name: Basit Sanitary Store
fullStackProject.description: A fully functional e-commerce website specializing in sanitary products, built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MySQL. Features include browsing, filtering, cart management, user accounts, and admin dashboard functionality.
